Name: Partition of the City of Wisdom
Desc: A curved gate that may be found in Sumeru, within many important locations of the Citadel of Regzar in particular. It is said that apart from the double eaves that can block both falling branches and mountain stones, the gate's dimensions themselves are the result of careful calculations â€” allowing only one Sumpter Beast bearing heavy cargo to pass through at a time, thus allowing for those coming in and out to be checked. However, it has conversely also been the case in the past that a particularly large Sumpter Beast might become stuck in these doors...
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
